channel.title: The Giant Beastcast
channel.description: The Giant Bomb East team gathers to talk about the week in video games, their lives, and basically anything that interests them. All from New York City!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Giant Bomb East team gathers to talk about the week in video games, their lives, and basically anything that interests them. All from New York City!
channel.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
channel.itunes:summary: The Giant Bomb East team gathers to talk about the week in video games, their lives, and basically anything that interests them. All from New York City!
channel.itunes:keywords: GiantBomb, Giant Bomb, Vinny Caravella, Alex Navarro, video games, PS4, WiiU, Xbox One, PC, PS Vita, 3DS

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 24
item.description: We talk about Activision's $5,900,000,000.00 purchase. So much money... We also share early impressions of Rise of the Tomb Raider, revisiting the Witcher 3, Yoshi's Woolly World, and the great Konami mystery.
item.itunes:subtitle: We talk about Activision's $5,900,000,000.00 purchase. So much money... We also share early impressions of Rise of the Tomb Raider, revisiting the Witcher 3, Yoshi's Woolly World, and the great Konami mystery.
item.itunes:summary: We talk about Activision's $5,900,000,000.00 purchase. So much money... We also share early impressions of Rise of the Tomb Raider, revisiting the Witcher 3, Yoshi's Woolly World, and the great Konami mystery.
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.itunes:keywords: GiantBomb, Giant Bomb, Vinny Caravella, Alex Navarro, video games, PS4, WiiU, Xbox One, PC, PS Vita, 3DS

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 23
item.description: Happy Halloweeeeeeeeeen! In our special holiday edition we share how not to act on Halloween and why we're all terrible people. We also talk about WWE 2K16, Sony's Paris get-together, The Librarian, Halo 5, and your questions!
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Halloweeeeeeeeeen! In our special holiday edition we share how not to act on Halloween and why we're all terrible people. We also talk about WWE 2K16, Sony's Paris get-together, The Librarian, Halo 5, and your questions!

item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.itunes:keywords: GiantBomb, Giant Bomb, Vinny Caravella, Alex Navarro, video games, PS4, WiiU, Xbox One, PC, PS Vita, 3DS

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 22
item.description: We've got some informed impressions regarding Assassin's Creed Syndicate, some thoughts on the Steam Link, and feelings about Rock Band and Guitar Hero. Then it all gets real as we lay bare the dark truth about Chuck E. Cheese.
item.itunes:subtitle: We've got some informed impressions regarding Assassin's Creed Syndicate, some thoughts on the Steam Link, and feelings about Rock Band and Guitar Hero. Then it all gets real as we lay bare the dark truth about Chuck E. Cheese.
item.itunes:summary: We've got some informed impressions regarding Assassin's Creed Syndicate, some thoughts on the Steam Link, and feelings about Rock Band and Guitar Hero. Then it all gets real as we lay bare the dark truth about Chuck E. Cheese.
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.itunes:keywords: GiantBomb, Giant Bomb, Vinny Caravella, Alex Navarro, video games, PS4, WiiU, Xbox One, PC, PS Vita, 3DS

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 21
item.description: Alex returns to Giant Bomb East from the Far East and has some tales to share with the Beast. We also learn the stunning conclusion of NBA 2K16's story, learn about Steam Machines, and learn how to get someone to see a Minions game.
item.itunes:subtitle: Alex returns to Giant Bomb East from the Far East and has some tales to share with the Beast. We also learn the stunning conclusion of NBA 2K16's story, learn about Steam Machines, and learn how to get someone to see a Minions game.

item.itunes:keywords: GiantBomb, Giant Bomb, Vinny Caravella, Alex Navarro, video games, PS4, WiiU, Xbox One, PC, PS Vita, 3DS

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 20
item.description: Disruptor Beam's Rich Gallup beams aboard as we talk Trek, Wars and all things Star related. We also have early impressions of Mirror's Edge and Unravel as well as some questions for the magicians making Rebel Galaxy. Engage? ENGAGE!
item.itunes:subtitle: Disruptor Beam's Rich Gallup beams aboard as we talk Trek, Wars and all things Star related. We also have early impressions of Mirror's Edge and Unravel as well as some questions for the magicians making Rebel Galaxy. Engage? ENGAGE!

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 19
item.description: Pre-ordering, Crowd funding, Tony Hawk... can we make it through these "interesting" times? Can you get good internet in the Arctic Circle? Does the house always win? FIND OUT!
item.itunes:subtitle: Pre-ordering, Crowd funding, Tony Hawk... can we make it through these "interesting" times? Can you get good internet in the Arctic Circle? Does the house always win? FIND OUT!

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 18
item.description: Let's talk about voice actors, unions and strikes! Let's talk about Kickstarter and not making what you promised! Heck, let's talk about how digital goods are failing the children of American. All of this and more on this week's Beastcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's talk about voice actors, unions and strikes! Let's talk about Kickstarter and not making what you promised! Heck, let's talk about how digital goods are failing the children of American. All of this and more on this week's Beastcast.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 17
item.description: Tokyo Game Show is happening and we talk about our favorite news, but mostly we get excited for Persona 5. We also chat about Metal Gear Online, Forza 6, NHL 16, copyright laws and fair use, and putting everyone out of a job by giving everyone a job.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tokyo Game Show is happening and we talk about our favorite news, but mostly we get excited for Persona 5. We also chat about Metal Gear Online, Forza 6, NHL 16, copyright laws and fair use, and putting everyone out of a job by giving everyone a job.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 16
item.description: Is Apple getting deep into video games? Is the composer for Halo and Destiny getting his due? How, exactly, do you pronounce Peter Stormare? We answer all of these questions, and then go off and talk about vaping for the rest of the show.
item.itunes:subtitle: Is Apple getting deep into video games? Is the composer for Halo and Destiny getting his due? How, exactly, do you pronounce Peter Stormare? We answer all of these questions, and then go off and talk about vaping for the rest of the show.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 15
item.description: Madden is out so game season is upon us! Mad Max, Metal Gear Solid V, and Until Dawn all get discussed. We also talk about getting paid for endorsed content, footbags, and Marry-oh.
item.itunes:subtitle: Madden is out so game season is upon us! Mad Max, Metal Gear Solid V, and Until Dawn all get discussed. We also talk about getting paid for endorsed content, footbags, and Marry-oh.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 14
item.description: We're live at PAX Prime 2015 and here to talk about indie games, raising kids, and of course... anime.
item.itunes:subtitle: We're live at PAX Prime 2015 and here to talk about indie games, raising kids, and of course... anime.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 13
item.description: We talk a lot about diners. We spend a long time on it. We also talk about Call of Duty: Black Ops III, Super Mario Maker, and Regulation D investment opportunities. But mostly it's about cheese fries and we play Life is a Highway.
item.itunes:subtitle: We talk a lot about diners. We spend a long time on it. We also talk about Call of Duty: Black Ops III, Super Mario Maker, and Regulation D investment opportunities. But mostly it's about cheese fries and we play Life is a Highway.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast: Episode 12
item.description: Samantha Kalman joins us to chat about her experience with Kickstarter, Ouya, and the trials of making an independent video game. Before all that we share our thoughts on Dark Souls 3, Naruto, and Jeff finally gets to play Fallout Shelter. And of course..
item.itunes:subtitle: Samantha Kalman joins us to chat about her experience with Kickstarter, Ouya, and the trials of making an independent video game. Before all that we share our thoughts on Dark Souls 3, Naruto, and Jeff finally gets to play Fallout Shelter. And of course..

item.title: The Giant Beastcast: Episode 11
item.description: We're joined by Gita Jackson as we talk about Time magazine's vision of virtual reality, how Konami might have more threats than Dracula, and our highlights from Gamescom. Also, where do you want to spend your 9-5 in our dystopian future?
item.itunes:subtitle: We're joined by Gita Jackson as we talk about Time magazine's vision of virtual reality, how Konami might have more threats than Dracula, and our highlights from Gamescom. Also, where do you want to spend your 9-5 in our dystopian future?

item.title: The Giant Beastcast: Episode 10
item.description: Windows 10 is out just in time for our tenth episode so let's talk about it! We also have more updates on Splatoon, Rocket League, and Halo 5: Guardians. And remember the Ouya? Remember Dragon Quest? Remember shorter podcasts?
item.itunes:subtitle: Windows 10 is out just in time for our tenth episode so let's talk about it! We also have more updates on Splatoon, Rocket League, and Halo 5: Guardians. And remember the Ouya? Remember Dragon Quest? Remember shorter podcasts?

item.title: The Giant Beastcast: Episode 09
item.description: Why do some things hold up and others don't? Why do we want remakes? We explore nostalgia and some of our early game experiences. Also, Minions. Also, EVO, Rocket League, and even more Hearthstone!
item.itunes:subtitle: Why do some things hold up and others don't? Why do we want remakes? We explore nostalgia and some of our early game experiences. Also, Minions. Also, EVO, Rocket League, and even more Hearthstone!

item.title: The Giant Beastcast: Episode 07
item.description: Are magazines the future? What's in the future for Splatoon? Should Dragon Ball have a future? Is the future ready for future content creators? Just how do we organize our stuff in the future? So many questions. No answers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Are magazines the future? What's in the future for Splatoon? Should Dragon Ball have a future? Is the future ready for future content creators? Just how do we organize our stuff in the future? So many questions. No answers.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast: Episode 06
item.description: What happened with Batman? Is Star Citizen a game? Is it better to have fluff content in your game to flesh out the world or to just streamline the whole experience? Maybe... it's a tie.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 05
item.description: E3 is done and we're back to share the good vibes! We share some final thoughts from last week, get deep into our Batman experiences, mix art and money, and procedurally generate other random thoughts.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 03
item.description: It's a mad dash to electronic three as the gang tries to make coherent predictions about what we'll see at the show, while also discussing early Ratchet & Clank and Mirror's Edge info, examining what goes into an E3 demo, and lighting one final candle

item.description: Austin Walker joins us as we deliver updates on Splatoon, Danny Trejo, and Jeff's Australian accent. We also dig into topics ranging from streaming Adult Only games to the current online gaming environment.

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 0
item.description: We try to convince CNET's Jeff Bakalar that the Witcher's extended universe is amazing while he clues us in on where the real money is made. We've also got updates on the Grand Theft Auto movie, Splatoon, Alex's Mad Max impressions, and hot New York real
